arStrings.szText:
(PH) {c_label}{u}Ultimate Gorilla{/u}{/c} 
{icon:bullet,1.2} When you activate {c_important}Invoke{/c}, the Gorilla protects an area for {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds, continuously smashing surrounding enemies for {c_number}{payload:FOREST_SMASH}{/c} Physical damage and sending out waves that deal {c_number}[100|%|]{/c} of your Thorns damage. Within the protected area you have {c_number}100%{/c} Block Chance and Block Damage Reduction.

{c_important}The Protector's{/c} strikes deal {c_number}[{SF_9}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to Non-Elite enemies and reduce the damage you take from Elite enemies by {c_number}[{SF_8}*100|%|]{/c} for {c_number}{buffduration:ULT_TIMER}{/c} seconds.

{c_important}The Protector's{/c} area persists for an additional {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds. While in the area you are {c_important}{u}Unstoppable{/u}{/c} and any enemies or Small Missiles inside are Slowed by {c_number}[{SF_10}*100|%|]{/c}.
